author: guitargeek
body:
#### PR description:

Migrate most PhysicsTools/PatAlgos plugins to ESGetToken, as already tried in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/34307 but then decided to have it in a separate PR.

The migration of the only missing plugin, the `TauJetCorrFactorsProducer` is a bit more tricky. This will be done at a later stage.

#### PR validation:

CMSSW compiles.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

No backport intended.
title: Migrate most PhysicsTools/PatAlgos plugins to ESGetToken
